description: An instance record and an array of holdings records with embedded items

instance.description: The Instance, the bibliographic part, of this Inventory record set

instanceRelations.description: Object holding information of different types of Instance-to-Instance relationships to create

parentInstances.description: Collection of objects with information required for finding and linking to parent Instances

instanceIdentifier.description: Object with information required for finding the parent Instance to link to

hrid.description: A unique ID for the parent instance to link to

provisionalInstance.description: Object with at least the mandatory Instance properties required for creating a provisional Instance if the parent does not yet exist. Other valid Instance properties allowed.

instanceTypeId.description: The parent record’s resource type ID (UUID)

instancesRelationshipTypeId.description: UUID for the type of relationship to establish to a parent instance (article, volume, multipart, series)

childInstances.description: Collection of objects with information required for finding and linking to child Instances

instanceIdentifier.description: Object with information required for finding the child Instance to link to

hrid.description: A unique ID for the child instance to link to

provisionalInstance.description: Object with at least the mandatory Instance properties required for creating a provisional Instance if the child does not yet exist. Other valid Instance properties allowed.

instanceTypeId.description: The child record’s resource type ID (UUID)

instancesRelationshipTypeId.description: UUID for the type of relationship to establish to a child instance (article, volume, multipart, series)

precedingTitles.description: Collection of objects with information required for finding and linking to preceding Instances

instanceIdentifier.description: Object with information required for finding the preceding Instance to link to

hrid.description: A unique ID for the preceding instance to link to

provisionalInstance.description: Object with at least the mandatory Instance properties required for creating a provisional Instance if the preceding does not yet exist. Other valid Instance properties allowed.

instanceTypeId.description: The preceding Instance’s resource type ID (UUID)

succeedingTitles.description: Collection of objects with information required for finding and linking to succeeding Instances

instanceIdentifier.description: Object with information required for finding the succeeding Instance to link to

hrid.description: A unique ID for the succeeding instance to link to

provisionalInstance.description: Object with at least the mandatory Instance properties required for creating a provisional Instance if the succeeding does not yet exist. Other valid Instance properties allowed.

instanceTypeId.description: The succeeding Instance’s resource type ID (UUID)

holdingsRecords.description: Collection of holdings of the Instance, each holdings record with embedded items
